topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c5b6fb6368726cb8710300#post_54c5b6fb6368726cb8710300
Levi to me encompasses everything WRONG with AoT.
He is a self-centered, self-righteous piece of shit who has no respect or compassion for the people under his command. And the writer is trying to play the "But he's so cool and has a tragic backstory" angle to him. Whoopdi-fucking-do. He's a jerk. And don't I care how many dead wives he's had. Throwing your subordinates lives away is unforgivable. You know who else had a sucky past? Monkey D. Luffy. That doesn't stop him from fighting for his friends.
